body.name: IRONCK Industrial Bookshelves and Bookcases with Doors 11.8in Depth Floor Standing 5 Shelf Display Storage Shelves Bookcase Home Decor Furniture for Home, Office, Living Room, Bedroom
features: Durable & Solid Shelf - Constructed with thickened pipe metal and hard durable P2 grade MDF board. High-quality materials and design bring you a really high quality wall shelf.
A 5-tier bookcase standing at 23.6"W * 11.8"D * 59.4"H, with the clean lines, is ideal for almost any space in your home
Deeper Depth - 11.8in Depth bookcase enables you to put your normal sized textbooks
Industrial Shelving - It provides ample space and wall decor. Working as a Storage Shelf, Bookshelf or Display Rack. Easy to match well with your home decor such as Home Office, Living Room, Bed Room
Easy to Assemble - With clear instructions and labeled parts, you’ll set it up in no time to pore over the pages for hours on end
Trusted Service - If there's any problem with our item, please feel free to contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IRONCK Industrial Bookcase 5 Tier Easy to Match This bookcase is an attractive piece of industrial furniture, able to coordinate with the rest of the stylish and modern. It can stand on its own in the lounge, living room, bedroom, office with its unusual industrial design and elegant rustic features. The bookcase also provides plenty of storage room to dress up with keepsakes, trinkets, and treasures or used to hold school books, novels, magazines, etc.

IRONCK Bookcase Multi-functional Simple & Functional It can be used as a bookcase to store books and documents at your home or in your office.Or put it in your living room to show your photos, to collect curios and combine a TV stand as your entertainment centerOr put it in the dining room as a stylish shelf to stack your precious wine bottles and glasses.Or add it to the kitchen to preserve the toaster, spices, cutlery, and any kitchen utensils you need.
Color Vintage Black Load Capacity of Each Tier 22 lbs Material Metal and MDF board Bookshelf Dimension 23.6"W * 11.8"D * 59.4"H

Industrial Doored Cabinet There is a shelf behind the door. With the farmhouse style doors, you could hide the little things into it to easily make your house looks more tidy. Tipover Resistance metal brackets Tipover Resistance Device is included to secure the Bookcase to the wall and prevent tipping injuries. We suggest you use the bookshelf with the tipover resistance device.

Strengthen Screws The key reason to opt for this bookcase is its solid construction. With the strengthen screws at the back, the bookcase is more stable. 11.8in Deeper Depth The P2 class MDF board we use is non-toxic and meets all safety standards. 11.8in Depth bookcase enables you to put your normal sized textbooks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf was super easy to put together by myself and didn’t take too long at all. The only negative is that it was missing the small plates and screws that go on the doors and keep them closed with the magnetic piece. Easily replaceable by a trip to Lowe’s soon. I’m thinking about getting a second one for another room.**If you crochet or knit, it’s great for yarn, which is what I’m using this one for. Skeins of blanket yarn fit perfectly and you can get 8 skeins per shelf! The cabinets are the bonus to keep the cats away from it all lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall great product
reviews.reviewText: The two cabinets were easy to assemble, and are sturdy. They look very nice. The cost of the cabinet is reasonable for the quality of the product. Would recommend this product to buy. D. Grant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars small but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice bookcase for the money. Not fine furniture but attractive and sturdy. I was puzzled about all the people who gave this product 3 stars because it was small. It is a small bookcase but the dimensions given are accurate so the small size should not have been a surprise. It was a perfect fit for my bathroom. I would have given it 5 stars but some of the directions could have been better. It was not difficult to assemble but the directions were occasionally a little murky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The book case held most of my books. If a person has a average amount of books ,this book case will be sufficient. The instructions were easy to follow. The bookcase is sturdy. I do like how the bookcase color fit with the rest of my furniture. All the parts fit as they should. The only problem I had was how the hardware was labeled. I believe the bookcase was worth the prices I paid for, compared to a Walmart bookcase. Update, need another bookcase,too many books. I will buy another bookcase to match this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a good bookshelf. Returning because it was smaller than what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, cute & what we needed
reviews.reviewText: I needed bookshelves that wouldn't take up too much space in a smaller room. These aren't super tall and bulky like most bookshelves, so I thought they might be a good fit for our space. I ordered two of them and was able to fit all of our books (we have a very big collection!) and we store our board games inside the cabinets too! I was pleasantly surprised with how much you can store in these bookshelves. Putting them together was a little tedious, I did it myself and the first one took about an hour and a half and the second one took half the time because by then I knew what I was doing lol But all in all I'm very happy with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Decent Shelf
reviews.reviewText: This a decent shelf. It was fairly easy to assemble, but it is not very sturdy. However, I like the overall look of it. I don't think I would buy this again, but it will work okay for what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I will never buy another IRONCK item again. The package arrived ripped open and the hardware necessary to assemble it was missing. They told me they would send replacement hardware weeks ago, and then last week they said it would ship in 4 or 5 days. So far, nothing. How hard can it be to grab a package of the hardware and ship it? I'd ship the rest of the pieces back, but based on their assurances I discarded the mangled box. Amazon should think seriously about dropping IRONCK as a vendor. In another day or so I will be contacting the Better Business Bureau about this company's terrible customer service. In the meantime, I am stuck with over $100 worth of now worthless wood pieces and I am out that $100+.
